title: Dexamethasone tablets and liquid: a steroid medicine
description: NHS medicines information on dexamethasone tablets and liquid - what they're used for, side effects, dosage and who can take them.
cleaned_text: Find out how dexamethasone tablets and liquid treat inflammatory conditions and autoimmune conditions, and how to take them. Find out how dexamethasone tablets and liquid treat inflammatory conditions and autoimmune conditions, and how to take them.
